org.pebble.core.encoding

Class EncodingInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pebble.core.encoding.EncodingInfo

  • public class EncodingInfo
extends Object
    Class used to keep track of relevant encoding information.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      EncodingInfo()
      Sets encoding info with initial values.

    • Constructor Detail

      • EncodingInfo

        public EncodingInfo()
        Sets encoding info with initial values.

    • Method Detail

      • getCurrentIndex

        public int getCurrentIndex()
        Returns:
        index for next encoded entry.

      • getOffset

        public long getOffset()
        Returns:
        current total numbers of bits used to encode past entries. Its value indicate the starting offset of the encoded representation of next entry.

      • incrementCurrentIndex

        public int incrementCurrentIndex()
        Increments in one the current index.
        Returns:
        current index value before incrementation of its value.

      • incrementOffset

        public long incrementOffset(int deltaOffset)
        Increments offset into deltaOffset and returns its new value.
        Parameters:
        deltaOffset - value into what will be incremented offset.
        Returns:
        value of offset after its incrementation.

      • save

        public void save(OutputStream outputStream)
        Stores current encoding info into outputStream.
        Parameters:
        outputStream - used to store the encoding info.

      • load

        public static EncodingInfo load(InputStream inputStream)
                         throws IOException
        Loads encoding info from inputStream.
        Parameters:
        inputStream - from which encoding info is read.
        Returns:
        returns instance of encoding info with the values read from inputStream.
        Throws:
        IOException - in case there is an exception reading from inputStream.
